title: Person
description: An individual who interacts independently with the instutution in any of a variety of roles (e.g. "student", "constituent","vendor", ...).

createdBy.title: Created By
createdBy.description: The name of the originator (user or system) of the data. This is informational only, do not use in business logic!

createdOn.title: Created On
createdOn.description: The date and time when the entity instance was created

modifiedBy.title: Modified By
modifiedBy.description: The name of the modifier (user or system) of the data. This is informational only, do not use in business logic!

modifiedOn.title: Modified On
modifiedOn.description: The date and time when the entity instance was last modified

id.title: ID
id.description: A global identifier of a person.

privacyStatus.title: Privacy Status
privacyStatus.description: A privacy status of person's information

privacyCategory.title: Privacy Category
privacyCategory.description: The global category of information privacy protection

names.title: Name
names.description: The names associated with a person, specified by type (e.g. "legal", "birth", ...).

type.title: Name Type
type.description: The type of person's name being defined. For example, a "Primary" name.

category.title: Name Type Category
category.description: The global category of person name types

preference.title: Name Preference
preference.description: Indicates the preferred name for the type

title.title: Title
title.description: The person's title, e.g., "Mr.", "Mrs.", "Dr.", etc.

firstName.title: First Name
firstName.description: The person's first, or given, name.

lastNamePrefix.title: Last Name Prefix
lastNamePrefix.description: The article or preposition portion of a person's last name, for example, "De la", "Van", "Van der Von", etc.

lastName.title: Last Name
lastName.description: The person's last, or family, name.

professionalAbbreviations.title: Professional Abbreviation
professionalAbbreviations.description: A post-nominal professional abbreviation, reflecting an earned degree or honor, e.g. "M.D.", "Ph.D.", etc.

dateOfBirth.title: Date of Birth
dateOfBirth.description: The date when a person was born.

dateDeceased.title: Date Deceased
dateDeceased.description: The date when a person died.

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: The biological and/or social/cultural masculinity or femininity of the person.

ethnicity.title: Ethnicity
ethnicity.description: The ethnic association of the person.

ethnicCategory.title: Ethnic Category
ethnicCategory.description: The global category of ethnic origin to which a person belongs.

races.title: Race
races.description: The categories of race to which a person belongs.

racialCategory.title: Racial Category
racialCategory.description: The higher-level racial category to which the person belongs.

maritalStatus.title: Marital Status
maritalStatus.description: The current marital state (e.g. single, married, divored, ...) of the person.

maritalCategory.title: Marital Category
maritalCategory.description: The higher-level marital category of the person.

citizenshipStatus.title: Citizenship Status
citizenshipStatus.description: The citizenship status of the person with regards to the country where a given institution is located

category.title: Citizehship Status Category
category.description: A global category of citizenship statuses

nationalities.title: Nationality
nationalities.description: The foreign nationalities (citizenships of a foreign country) the person holds

visaStatus.title: Visa Status
visaStatus.description: The visa status of the person with regards to the country where a given institution is located

category.title: Visa Category
category.description: A global category of visa types

status.title: Status
status.description: The last known status of the visa

startOn.title: Start Date
startOn.description: The start date of the visa

endOn.title: End Date
endOn.description: The expiration date of the visa

roles.title: Role
roles.description: The roles that a person fills as he/she interacts with the institution.

role.title: Role
role.description: The actions and activities assigned to, required of, or expected of a person. For example, the roles of "Faculty" or "Student".

startOn.title: Start Date
startOn.description: The date when a person starts filling a role.

endOn.title: End Date
endOn.description: The date when a person stops filling a role.

credentials.title: Credential
credentials.description: Information that identifies a user to a system such as a network or computer.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of credential, such as "Person ID", "System ID", etc.

value.title: Value
value.description: The current value of the credential.

startOn.title: Start Date
startOn.description: The date when the credential starts being valid.

endOn.title: End Date
endOn.description: The date when the credential stops being valid.

locations.title: Location
locations.description: The physical locations where a person resides or may be contacted by mail.

id.title: ID
id.description: A globally unique identifier of a person's mailing location

description.title: Description
description.description: A full description or comments about the location

type.title: Type
type.description: A type of location for a person. Includes a standard type (e.g. 'home', 'school') and an optional, custom type to further identify the type of location.

locationType.title: Type
locationType.description: A type of location for a person (e.g. "home", "school").

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the person's relationship to the location

preference.title: Preferred Location
preference.description: Specifies if the location is preferred over others of the same type.

addressLines.title: Address
addressLines.description: The address lines of the person's location, such as a street address, post office box number, or city, region, and postal code.

place.title: Place
place.description: A country specific postal region.  Postal regions are expressed as a hierarchy of country, region, and sub-region, and as a locality with postal automation codes

country.title: Country
country.description: The country where the person's mailing address is located.

title.title: Country
title.description: The name of the country, as used in everyday speech.

postalTitle.title: Postal Country
postalTitle.description: The name of the country when mail is being addressed from an international sender.

code.title: Code
code.description: The code of a region within the country

title.title: Title
title.description: The full name of the region

subRegion.title: Subregion
subRegion.description: A subregion within the country and region

title.title: Title
title.description: The name of a subregion

locality.title: city
locality.description: The name of the city or town.

title.description: The full name of the region

subRegion.title: Subregion

locality.title: city

deliveryPoint.title: Delivery Point
deliveryPoint.description: A specific set of digits between 00 and 99 assigned to every address. When combined with the ZIP + 4 code, the delivery point provides a unique identifier for every deliverable address served by the US Postal Service.

carrierRoute.title: Carrier Route
carrierRoute.description: A subdivision of a US zipcode.

correctionDigit.title: Correction Digit
correctionDigit.description: A number used to check for errors in a US ZIP code, delivery point, or carrier route.

title.title: Country
title.description: The name of the country, as used in everyday speech.

postalTitle.title: Postal Country
postalTitle.description: The name of the country when mail is being addressed from an international sender.

code.title: Code
code.description: The code of a region within the country

title.title: Title
title.description: The full name of the region

subRegion.title: Subregion
subRegion.description: A subregion within the country and region

title.title: Title
title.description: The name of a subregion

locality.title: city
locality.description: The name of the city or town.

geographicAreas.title: Geographic Areas
geographicAreas.description: The geographic areas assigned to this location.

items.title: Geographic Areas
items.description: The geographic areas assigned to this location.

id.title: ID
id.description: The global identifier for Geographic Areas

seasonalOccupancies.title: Seasonal Occupancy
seasonalOccupancies.description: Seasons during the year when the location is typically occupied, expressed as repeating time periods.

timePeriod.title: Time Period
timePeriod.description: The period of time to be repeated.

startOn.title: Start On
startOn.description: The beginning of the time period being repeated.

endOn.title: End On
endOn.description: The end of the time period being repeated.

repeatRule.title: Repeat Rule
repeatRule.description: The rule that describes how to repeat the time period.

oneOf.title: Daily
oneOf.description: Rules for repeating on a daily basis.

interval.title: Interval
interval.description: Number of days between each repetition.

ends.title: Ends
ends.description: When to end the daily repetitions.

repetitions.title: Repetitions
repetitions.description: Number of times to repeat, then stop.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date after which to stop repeating.

oneOf.title: Weekly
oneOf.description: Rules for repeating on a weekly basis.

interval.title: Interval
interval.description: Number of weeks between each repetition.

daysOfWeek.title: Days of Week
daysOfWeek.description: The days of the week on which to repeat the event.

ends.title: Ends
ends.description: When to end the weekly repetitions.

repetitions.title: Repetitions
repetitions.description: Number of times to repeat, then stop.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date after which to stop repeating.

oneOf.title: Monthly
oneOf.description: Rules for repeating on a monthly basis.

interval.title: Interval
interval.description: Number of months between each repetition.

repeatBy.title: Repeat By
repeatBy.description: How to calculate the day of the month on which to start repeating.

dayOfMonth.title: Day of Month
dayOfMonth.description: The number of the day in the month on which to start repeating.

dayOfWeek.title: Day of Week
dayOfWeek.description: The cardinal day of the week (e.g., the first Tuesday, the last Friday, etc.) in the month on which to start repeating.

occurrence.title: Occurrence
occurrence.description: The nth occurrence of the day of the week in the month. Use a positive number to count from the start of the month (e.g., 1 = first in the month, 2 = second in the month), and a negative number to count from the end of the month (e.g. -1 = last in the month, -2 = second from last, etc.).

ends.title: Ends
ends.description: When to end the monthly repetitions.

repetitions.title: Repetitions
repetitions.description: Number of times to repeat, then stop.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date after which to stop repeating.

oneOf.title: Yearly
oneOf.description: Rules for repeating on an annual basis.

interval.title: Interval
interval.description: Number of years between each repetition.

ends.title: Ends
ends.description: When to end the yearly repetitions.

repetitions.title: Repetitions
repetitions.description: Number of times to repeat, then stop.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date after which to stop repeating.

phones.title: Phone
phones.description: The phones and phone-connected devices at which a person can be contacted.

id.title: ID
id.description: A globally unique identifier of a phone.

type.title: Type
type.description: A type of phone for a person. Includes a standard type (e.g. 'mobile', 'home') and an optional, custom type to further identify the type of phone.

phoneType.title: Type
phoneType.description: A type of phone for a person (e.g. 'mobile', 'home').

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the phone for the person.

preference.title: Preferred Phone
preference.description: Specifies if the phone is preferred over others of the same type.

countryCallingCode.title: Country Calling Code
countryCallingCode.description: The country calling code of telephone and/or mobile device when dialing internationally.

number.title: Number
number.description: The number assigned to the phone.

extension.title: Extension
extension.description: The extension used to connect to the phone when multiple phones share the same primary number.

emails.title: Email
emails.description: The email addresses at which a person can be contacted.

id.title: ID
id.description: A globally unique identifier of an email.

type.title: Type
type.description: A type of email for a person. Includes a standard type (e.g. 'personal', 'business') and an optional, custom type to further identify the type of email.

emailType.title: Type
emailType.description: A type of email for a person (e.g. 'personal', 'business').

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the email for the person.

startOn.title: Start On
startOn.description: The date the email became active

endOn.title: End On
endOn.description: The date the email became inactive

preference.title: Preferred Email
preference.description: Specifies if the email is preferred over others of the same type.

address.title: Email Address
address.description: An email address for the person.

socialMedia.title: Social Media
socialMedia.description: The social media account at which a person can be contacted.

id.title: ID
id.description: A globally unique identifier of a social media contact.

type.title: Social Media
type.description: A type of social media account for a person. Includes a standard type (e.g. 'skype', 'facebook') and an optional, custom type to further identify the type of social media account.

socialMediaType.title: Type
socialMediaType.description: A type of social media account (e.g. 'skype', 'facebook').

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of a social media account information for the person.

preference.title: Preferred Social Media
preference.description: Specifies if the social media account is preferred over others of the same type.

address.title: Address
address.description: The username, handle or other address of the social media account.
